original_text: And Balak's anger was kindled against Balaam, and he struck his hands together. And Balak said to Balaam, “I called you to curse my enemies, and behold, you have blessed them these three times.
korean_text: 발락이 발람에게 노하여 손뼉을 치며 말하되 내가 그대를 부른 것은 내 원수를 저주하라는 것이어늘 그대가 이같이 세 번 그들을 축복하였도다

sentences.original_text: And Balak's anger was kindled against Balaam
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 발락의 분노가 발람을 향하여 타올랐다

sentences.original_text: and he struck his hands together.
I called you to curse my enemies,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 내 원수들을 저주하라고 너를 불렀는데,

sentences.original_text: you have blessed them these three times.
